body.p:
Covington Aug 23d/65
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Kentucky
Sir

I hereby make an application for a requisition upon the governor of Ohio for Adam I Surface who is a fugitive from justice from this state. This application is based upon an original affidavit of Andrew I Surface, which is herewith transmitted to your Excellency I suggest Moses Nelson Esqr as a suitable person to act as agent of the state in
the matter -- Have the kindness to send me the necessary papers as soon as convienent

Very Respcty
Your obt servt
R B Carpenter
Comths Atty
9th Judicial
Dist
